data.actual_result: The list shouldn't be at the same point in this different server than in the other
data.expected_result: The list should reset because it's not the same server
data.short_description: When scrolling down the member list on the right in a server and going in another, the list is at the same point
data.steps_to_repro: - Scroll down the list (no need to go all the way) - Go in some others servers (try multiples because it can be random) - Observe the list
